name: Empyria
description:
Empyria is a first person steampunk spell slinger set in an open world. Follow the story or explore the city. With over 300 spell combinations, you can choose the way you want to play!

Empyria was made by nine students in the Algonquin College Game Development program, and is currently in Alpha. The game is still actively being developed, and will be updated as new content is added.
